messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Cargonians please lets cooperate dont force me to call ERT.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Port Quarter Maintenance.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Fuck off ai stop calling shittle

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on the communications traffic on your station, we believe that one of the station's animals/bots has developed [REDACTED] level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Get on the shuttle,use walk when going by the bridge pls
